abstract.t: IPv6-in-IPv4 tunnel endpoints support an MTU of 1280 bytes or larger via static prearrangements and/or dynamic MTU determination based on ICMPv4 messages, but these methods have known operational limitations. This document proposes a new MTU determination mechanism for IPv6-in-IPv4 tunnels that supports larger MTUs using a link adaptation scheme with tunnel endpoint-based segmentation/ reassembly and dynamic segment size probing.
